"<br>Linking Phantasy Star Online 2 es<b:
"Characters linked between Phantasy Star Online 2 and Phantasy Star Online 2 es (PSO2es) will be connected in the following ways:

・Some EXP earned in PSO2es will be shared with PSO2
・Meseta is shared
・Inventory is shared
・Includes weapons, units, clothing, parts etc.
・Mags can be raised in both

For further details, please consult the PSO2es online manual. Clicking the link below will open a new page in your browser.
<&URL pso2_players_manual>"
